reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Combat international narcotics production and trafficking; reduce the cultivation and production of drugs; prevent the resurgence of drug production; and limit the public health effects of the drug trade through international drug control and demand reduction, prevention and treatment projects.

This award strives to combat international narcotics production and trafficking; reduce the cultivation and production of drugs; prevent the resurgence of drug production; and limit the public health effects of the drug trade trhough international drug control and demand reduction, prevention and treatment projects. More specifically, this includes Modification P00006: Flight Training, Delivery, Additional Repairs, and Mast Disassembly and Shipment.. Modification P00011: Provide additional funds to comply with QCL and fix issues with the avionics and electrical components.. Modification P00008: Add flyable storage and replacement battery. Decrease negotiated price of training.. Information Redacted [Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified.].

To help nations effectively establish the conditions and capacity for achieving peace, security, and stability; and for responding effectively against arising threats to national or international security and stability.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States
